message: I love Consolas as my editing font. But on my MacBook screen I want to use 15pt and on my display at home I want to use 16pt. Any ideas how I can configure this in my .vimrc?
Here is a start: system_profiler SPDisplaysDataType | grep Resolution | awk '{print $2}'
that will get you the screen width - assuming you are using different resolutions
How you call that depends one what tools you like best - could be done just in vimscript, and then you set your font setting in an if statement
